about_the_game:
JUST FIGHT

There's a simple pleasure to jumping into a quick match against a friend or foe. With a minimalist art style and straight-forward controls you'll feel at home in the familiar game-play yet challenged by the adaptability of your opponents. PolyFight is a test of your reaction time, positional play, and accuracy with a mouse.

Up to 8 players!

NO ROUND THE SAME

Each round greets you with a refreshed layout of moveable walls. Could there be a mountain of obstacles between you and your opponent? Could there be nothing? Will you get lucky and spawn behind cover? How quickly can you adapt to the changing environment?

CUSTOMIZE

Squares, purples, triangles, yellows. There's a shade and shape for every player to play their way.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sonoma
  • Processor: Apple M1 or inel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 Mac Edition
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Piezo
  • Additional Notes: PolyFight should run on low-end devices with an internet connection.
